Package andesite.player

Interface AndesitePlayer

All Superinterfaces:
AudioProvider, java.lang.AutoCloseable, BasePlayer
public interface AndesitePlayer
extends BasePlayer, AudioProvider

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AndesiteTrackMixer mixer()
    Returns the track mixer for this player.

    Returns the state of the mixer.

    Requests the player switches to the mixer as soon as possible.

  • Method Details

    • mixer

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue AndesiteTrackMixer mixer()
      Returns the track mixer for this player.
      Returns:
      The track mixer for this player.

    • mixerState

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue AndesitePlayer.MixerState mixerState()
      Returns the state of the mixer.
      Returns:
      The state of the mixer.

    • switchToMixer

      void switchToMixer()
      Requests the player switches to the mixer as soon as possible.
      The mixer will be polled for new frames until it returns one. While it doesn't return one, the current provider will be used instead.

    • switchToSingle

      void switchToSingle()
      Requests the player switches to the default provider as soon as possible.
      The default provider will be polled for new frames until it returns one. While it doesn't return one, the current provider will be used instead.
